name: Image Search App
desc: Web Application  dedicated to proprietary stock photography.

name: Movie Search App
desc: A website to search any movie and read about the movie and its rating

name: Online Code Playground
desc: An online code editor project built using React.js and CodeMirror, providing a dynamic collaborative coding environment.for web development. It features syntax highlighting, code execution, and a variety of themes for customization.

name: Hospital Management System
desc: A Front-end project on Hospital Management System. Developed a web-based hospital management system using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.• Designed a user-friendly interface for easy navigation and data entry.

name: Face Recognition Attendence System
desc: Face recognition attendance system is a python-based application that uses different algorithms to recognise human faces.• It allows the user to accurately and efficiently monitor the attendance of personnel in an organization.

name: Licence Plate Detection and Recognition
desc: Licence Plate Detection and Recognition using Python is a computer vision project that utilizes various image processing techniques to detect and recognize licence plate numbers from images or videos. Utilize computer vision algorithms to localize, segment and read licence

name: Full Stack Food Delivery App
desc: A MERN-based food delivery application is a web application developed using the MERN stack, which includes MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. This application allows users to conveniently order food online , browse menus, customize their orders, and have the food delivered to their specified location with minimum price

name: E-Sabjiwala
desc: A MERN-based food delivery application is a web application developed using the MERN stack, which includes MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. This application allows users to conveniently order food online , browse menus, customize their orders, and have the groceries delivered to their specified location with minimum price
